set.base.name: Base Set
card.base1.name: 후딘
ability.base1.name: 피해 교환
ability.base1.text: 아군 포켓몬의 데미지 카운터 1개를 다른 포켓몬에게 옮길 수 있다. 체력이 충분하지 않는 포켓몬에겐 옮길 수 없다. 잠듦, 혼란, 마비, 상태일 때에는 사용할 수 없다.
attack.base1.1.name: 이상한빛
attack.base1.1.text: 동전을 한 번 던져서 앞면이 나오면 상대의 배틀 포켓몬을 혼란으로 만든다.
card.base2.name: 거북왕
ability.base2.name: 비바라기
ability.base2.text: 거북왕은 자신의 물 타입 포켓몬 대상으로 패의 물의 에너지를 1번에 몇 장이라도 붙일 수 있다. 잠듦, 혼란, 마비, 상태일 때에는 사용할 수 없다.
attack.base2.1.name: 하이드로펌프
attack.base2.1.text: 이 공격의 에너지 비용에 사용되지 않는 거북왕에 부착된 물의 에너지당 10 데미지를 더해 최대 20 추가 데미지를 줍니다.
card.base3.name: 럭키
attack.base3.1.name: 둥글둥글
attack.base3.1.text: 동전을 한 번 던져서 앞면이 나오면 상대의 다음 차례에 이 포켓몬은 기술의 데미지를 받지 않는다.
attack.base3.2.name: 이판사판태클
card.base4.name: 리자몽
ability.base4.name: 에너지번
ability.base4.text: 이 포켓몬에게 붙어 있는 에너지는 모두 불타입이 된다. 잠듦, 혼란, 마비, 상태일 때에는 사용할 수 없다.
attack.base4.1.name: 회오리불꽃
attack.base4.1.text: 이 포켓몬에게 붙어 있는 에너지 2개를 선택해서 버린다.
card.base5.name: 삐삐
attack.base5.1.name: 노래하기
attack.base5.1.text: 동전을 한 번 던져서 앞면이 나오면 상대의 배틀 포켓몬을 잠듦으로 만든다.
attack.base5.2.name: 손가락흔들기
attack.base5.2.text: 상대의 배틀 포켓몬이 가지고 있는 기술을 1개 선택해서 이 기술로서 사용한다.

attack.base6.1.name: 용의분노
attack.base6.2.name: 거품광선
attack.base6.2.text: 동전을 한 번 던져서 앞면이 나오면 상대의 배틀 포켓몬을 마비로 만든다.

attack.base7.1.name: 잽
attack.base7.2.name: 스페셜펀치

ability.base8.name: 반격
ability.base8.text: 괴력몬이 상대의 기술의 데미지를 받았을때 10의 데미지를 돌려준다. 잠듦, 혼란, 마비, 상태일 때에는 사용할 수 없다.
attack.base8.1.name: 지구던지기
card.base9.name: 코일
attack.base9.1.name: 전기자석파
attack.base9.1.text: 동전을 한 번 던져서 앞면이 나오면 상대의 배틀 포켓몬을 마비로 만든다.

attack.base9.2.text: 상대 벤치에 있는 모든 포켓몬들에게 20의 데미지를 준다. 자신에게도 80의 데미지를 준다.

attack.base10.2.name: 베리어
attack.base10.2.text: 한개의 초의 에너지를 사용해서 상대의 다음 차례에 이 포켓몬은 기술의 데미지나 효과를 받지 않는다.
card.base11.name: 니드킹
attack.base11.1.name: 몸부림치다
attack.base11.1.text: 동전을 한 번 던져서 앞면이 나오면 상대의 포켓몬에게 10의 데미지를 추가로 입히고 뒷면이 나오면 이 포켓몬에게도 10의 데미지를 입는다.
attack.base11.2.name: 맹독
attack.base11.2.text: 상대의 배틀 포켓몬을 독 상태로 만든다. 매 턴 20의 데미지를 받는다.

attack.base12.2.name: 불대문자
attack.base12.2.text: 이 포켓몬에게 붙어 있는 불꽃의 에너지를 1개 선택해서 버린다.

attack.base13.1.text: 이 공격의 에너지 비용에 사용되지 않는 강챙이에 부착된 물의 에너지당 10 데미지를 더해 최대 20 추가 데미지를 줍니다.

card.base70.text: 일반 포켓몬처럼 내보낼 수 있다. 원할때 없앨 수 있다.
card.base71.name: 컴퓨터통신
card.base71.text: 자신의 패를 2장 버려서 자신의 덱에서 원하는 카드를 한장 선택해서 패로 가져온다. 그리고 덱을 섞는다.
card.base72.name: 퇴화 스프레이
card.base72.text: 자신의 진화한 포켓몬을 1마리 선택해서 그 포켓몬의 위에서 부터 진화카드를 원하는 만큼 떼어내서 퇴화시킨다.
card.base73.name: 가짜 오박사
card.base73.text: 상대의 패를 모두 상대의 덱으로 되돌리고 잘 섞고나서 새로 7장을 뽑아서 패로 가져온다.
card.base74.name: 다우징머신
card.base74.text: 이 카드는 자신의 패를 2장 버리지 않으면 사용할 수 없다. 자신이 버린 카드에서 트레이너스 카드를 1장 선택해서 상대에게 보여주고 패로 가져온다.
card.base75.name: 짧은 치마
card.base75.text: 아군과 상대의 패를 공개하고 모든 트레이너스 카드를 덱으로 돌려놓고 덱을 섞는다.
card.base76.name: 포켓몬 교배기
card.base76.text: 패에 있는 스테이지 2 포켓몬을 맞는 일반 포켓몬과 합체한다.
card.base77.name: 포켓몬 교환기
card.base77.text: 패에있는 포켓몬 하나를 덱에있는 포켓몬과 교환한다. 이 두 포켓몬을 상대에게 공개한다.
card.base78.name: 퍼올리기
card.base78.text: 배틀에 나가있는 포켓몬 한마리를 패로 다시 불러온다.
card.base79.name: 슈펴 에너지 제거
card.base79.text: 자신의 포켓몬에 붙어있는 에너지 1개를 소모해서 상대의 포켓몬에 붙어있는 에너지 2개를 소모한다.
card.base80.name: 디펜드업
card.base80.text: 포켓몬에게 부착하면 다음 받을 데미지를 20 적게 받는다. 이후 이 카드는 소모된다.
card.base81.name: 에너지 회수
card.base81.text: 패에있는 카드 1장을 버린카드에 있는 2개의 에너지로 교환한다.
card.base82.name: 만병통치제
card.base82.text: 아군의 배틀 포켓몬의 잠듦, 혼란, 마비, 혹은 독 상태이상을 치유한다.
card.base83.name: 유지
card.base83.text: 패에서 2장의 카드를 덱으로 넣고 1장의 카드를 뽑는다.
card.base84.name: 파워업
card.base84.text: 배틀 포켓몬에게 부착하면 다음 공격은 10의 데미지를 추가로 준다.
card.base85.name: 포켓몬센터
card.base85.text: 포켓몬의 모든 데미지 카운터를 회복하고 그 포켓몬에 붙어있는 모든 에너지를 소모한다.
card.base86.name: 포켓몬피리
card.base86.text: 버린카드에 있는 기본 포켓몬을 벤치에 놓는다.

ability.foss52.name: 예지력
ability.foss52.text: 상대의 패를 드러냅니다. 암나이트가 상태이상에 걸리면 이 효과는 사라집니다.
attack.foss52.1.name: 물대포
attack.foss52.1.text: 이 공격의 에너지 비용에 사용되지 않는 암나이트에 부착된 물의 에너지당 10 데미지를 더해 최대 20 추가 데미지를 줍니다.
card.foss53.name: 고라파덕
attack.foss53.1.name: 두통
attack.foss53.1.text: 다음 차례에 상대는 패에서 트레이너스 카드를 꺼내서 사용할 수 없다.
attack.foss53.2.name: 분노의막치기
attack.foss53.2.text: 동전을 3번 던져서 앞면이 나온 수 x 10의 데미지를 준다.
card.foss54.name: 셀러
attack.foss54.1.name: 초음파
attack.foss54.1.text: 동전을 한 번 던져서 앞면이 나오면 상대의 배틀 포켓몬을 혼란으로 만든다.
attack.foss54.2.name: 껍질에숨기
attack.foss54.2.text: 동전을 한 번 던져서 앞면이 나오면 상대의 다음 차례에 이 포켓몬은 기술의 데미지를 받지 않는다.
card.foss55.name: 야돈
attack.foss55.1.name: 멍때리기
attack.foss55.1.text: 동전을 한 번 던져서 앞면이 나오면 야돈의 데미지 카운터 1개를 제거한다.
attack.foss55.2.name: 쓰레기 뒤지기
attack.foss55.2.text: 이 포켓몬에게 붙어 있는 초의 에너지를 1개 선택해서 버린다. 그 뒤, 트래쉬에서 트레이너스 카드 1장을 선택해서 패로 가져온다.
card.foss56.name: 왕눈해
ability.foss56.name: 겁쟁이
ability.foss56.text: 언제라도 왕눈해를 패로 돌려 보낼 수 있다. 상태이상일땐 발동하지 않는다.
attack.foss56.1.name: 용해액
card.foss57.name: 주뱃
attack.foss57.1.name: 초음파
attack.foss57.1.text: 동전을 한 번 던져서 앞면이 나오면 상대의 배틀 포켓몬을 혼란으로 만든다.
attack.foss57.2.name: 흡혈
attack.foss57.2.text: 상대의 배틀 포켓몬에게 준 데미지만큼 이 포켓몬의 데미지 카운터를 제거한다.
card.foss58.name: 후지박사
card.foss58.text: 벤치에 있는 포켓몬 한마리를 덱에 넣고 섞는다.
card.foss59.name: 에너지찾기
card.foss59.text: 덱에서 기본 에너지를 찾아 패로 가져온다. 그 뒤 덱을 섞는다.
card.foss60.name: 도박꾼
card.foss60.text: 패를 덱에 넣고 동전을 한 번 던진다. 앞면이 나오면 카드 8장을 뽑고 뒷면이 나오면 1장을 뽑는다.
card.foss61.name: 리사이클
card.foss61.text: 동전을 한 번 던져서 앞면이 나오면 버린카드중 1장을 덱에 맨 위에 넣는다.
card.foss62.name: 알수없는 화석
card.foss62.text: 일반 포켓몬처럼 내보낼 수 있다. 공격이 없고 교체할 수도 없으며 잠듦, 혼란, 마비, 독에 걸릴 수도없다. 원할때 없앨 수 있다.
set.tero.name: 로켓단
card.tero1.name: 악의 후딘
attack.tero1.1.name: 폭발적인 순간이동
attack.tero1.1.text: 악의 후딘을 벤치에 있는 포켓몬과 교체한다.
attack.tero1.2.name: 정신공격
card.tero2.name: 악의 아보크
attack.tero2.1.name: 노려보기
attack.tero2.1.text: 배틀에 나와있는 적의 포켓몬중 한마리를 선택하여 공격한다.이 기술은 상성을 무시하고 공격한다. 이 공격을 맞은 포켓몬의 특성은 그 턴에 발동하지 않는다.
attack.tero2.2.name: 독증기
attack.tero2.2.text: 상대의 배틀 포켓몬을 독으로 만든다. 상대 벤치에 있는 모든 포켓몬들에게 10의 데미지를 준다.
card.tero3.name: 악의 거북왕
attack.tero3.1.name: 하이드로캐논
attack.tero3.1.text: 이 공격의 에너지 비용에 사용되지 않는 악의 거북왕에 부착된 물의 에너지당 20 데미지를 더해 최대 40 추가 데미지를 줍니다.
attack.tero3.2.name: 로켓박치기
attack.tero3.2.text: 자신한테도 10의 데미지를 준다. 동전을 한 번 던져서 앞면이 나오면 상대의 다음 차례에 이 포켓몬은 기술의 데미지를 받지 않는다.
card.tero4.name: 악의 리자몽
attack.tero4.1.name: 발톱할퀴기
attack.tero4.2.name: 무한의 화염볼
attack.tero4.2.text: 악의 리자몽에게 붙어 있는 수 만큼 동전을 던진다. 앞면이 나온 수 x 50의 데미지를 상대에게 주고 그 수 만큼 악의 리자몽한테 붙어있는 불꽃의 에너지를 버린다.
card.tero5.name: 악의 망나뇽
ability.tero5.name: 미니언소환
ability.tero5.text: 악의 망나뇽을 배틀 포켓몬으로 내보냈을때 두개의 일반 포켓몬을 덱에서 꺼낸다. 그 뒤 덱을 섞는다.
attack.tero5.1.name: 거대한꼬리
attack.tero5.1.text: 동전을 던져서 뒷면이 나오면 이 기술은 실패한다.
card.tero6.name: 악의 닥트리오
ability.tero6.name: 싱크홀
ability.tero6.text: 상대가 배틀 포켓몬을 교체 할때 마다 동전을 한 번 던진다. 뒷면이 나오면 교체하는 포켓몬에게 20의 데미지를 준다.
attack.tero6.1.name: 때려눕히기
attack.tero6.1.text: 상대가 동전을 한 번 던져서 뒷면이 나오면 20의 추가 데미지를 준다.
card.tero7.name: 악의 골뱃
ability.tero7.name: 기습공격
ability.tero7.text: 악의 골뱃을 배틀 포켓몬으로 내보냈을때 상대 포켓몬중 한마리를 정해 10의 데미지를 준다.
attack.tero7.1.name: 날갯짓
attack.tero7.1.text: 상대 포켓몬중 한마리를 정해 20의 데미지를 준다.
card.tero8.name: 악의 갸라도스
ability.tero8.name: 파이널빔
ability.tero8.text: 악의 갸라도스가 공격으로 쓰러지면 동전을 던진다. 앞면이 나오면 악의 갸라도스에 붙어 있는 물의 에너지 x 20의 데미지를 준다.
attack.tero8.1.name: 냉동빔
attack.tero8.1.text: 동전을 한 번 던져서 앞면이 나오면 상대의 배틀 포켓몬을 마비로 만든다.
card.tero9.name: 악의 슬리퍼
attack.tero9.1.name: 사이코펀치
attack.tero9.2.name: 벤치조작
attack.tero9.2.text: 상대 벤치 포켓몬의 수 만큼 동전을 던진다. 동전이 뒷면이 나온 수 x 20의 데미지를 상대 배틀 포켓몬에게 준다.
card.tero10.name: 악의 괴력몬
attack.tero10.1.name: 메가톤펀치
attack.tero10.2.name: 내던지기
attack.tero10.2.text: 상대의 배틀 포켓몬과 붙어 있는 모든 카드를 덱에 다시 넣고 덱을 섞는다. 상대 벤치에 포켓몬이 없다면 이 기술은 실패한다.
card.tero11.name: 악의 레어코일
attack.tero11.1.name: 소닉붐
attack.tero11.2.name: 자력선
attack.tero11.2.text: 상대 배틀 포켓몬에 붙어 있는 에너지 1개를 선택하여 상대 벤치 포켓몬중 하나에게 옮긴다.
card.tero12.name: 악의 야도란
ability.tero12.name: 낚아채기
ability.tero12.text: 악의 야도란을 배틀 포켓몬으로 내보내면 최대 3장의 포켓몬 혹은 진화의 카드를 트래쉬에서 패로 가져온다.
attack.tero12.1.name: 불규칙한공격
attack.tero12.1.text: 동전을 한 번 던져서 뒷면이 나오면 이 기술은 실패한다.
card.tero13.name: 악의 라플레시아
ability.tero13.name: 짜증나는 꽃가루
ability.tero13.text: 이 포켓몬이 배틀 포켓몬으로 나가있는 한 트레이너스 카드를 사용할 수 없다.
attack.tero13.1.name: 꽃잎바람
attack.tero13.1.text: 동전을 3번 던져서 앞면이 나온 수 x 30의 데미지를 준다. 앞면이 2번 이상 나오면 라플레시아를 혼란으로 만든다.
card.tero14.name: 악의 또도가스
attack.tero14.1.name: 대폭발
attack.tero14.1.text: 적과 아군의 플레이에 나와 있는 또가스, 또도가스, 악의 또도가스의 수 x 20의 데미지를 준다.
attack.tero14.2.name: 스턴가스
attack.tero14.2.text: 동전을 한 번 던져서 앞면이 나오면 상대의 배틀 포켓몬을 독으로 만든다, 뒷면이 나오면 상대의 배틀 포켓몬을 마비로 만든다.

card.tero75.name: 삽질

card.tero78.name: 가스 공격

attack.wbsp9.2.text: 진화한 포켓몬을 선택하면 그 진화 포켓몬 카드를 돌려 받는다.

attack.wbsp12.2.name: 텔레키네시스

card.wbsp41.name: Lucky Stadium
card.wbsp41.text: During each player's turn (before he or she attacks), that may flip a coin. If heads, he or she draws a card. This card stays in play after being played. Discard this card if another Stadium card comes into play.
card.wbsp42.name: Pokémon Tower
card.wbsp42.text: If the effect of a Pokémon Power, attack, Energy card or Trainer card would put a card in a discard pile into its owner's hand, that card stays in that discard pile instead. This card stays in play after being played. Discard this card if another Stadium card comes into play.
card.wbsp43.name: 괴력몬

attack.wbsp46.2.name: 라이트닝볼트

attack.wbsp51.1.text: 동전을 던져서 앞면이 나오면 상대 벤치 포켓몬 한마리에게 20의 데미지를 준다.
attack.wbsp51.2.name: 태우다
attack.wbsp51.2.text: 동전을 한 번 던져서 앞면이 나오면 상대 배틀 포켓몬을 화상으로 만든다.
card.wbsp52.name: 칠색조
attack.wbsp52.1.name: 성스러운날개
attack.wbsp52.1.text: 동전을 한 번 던져서 뒷면이 나오면 60이 아닌 20의 데미지를 준다.
card.wbsp53.name: 스이쿤
ability.wbsp53.name: 순수한몸
ability.wbsp53.text: 물의 에너지를 스이쿤에게 부착하려면 스이쿤에게 이미 붙어있는 에너지 하나를 소모해야한다.
attack.wbsp53.1.name: 최면파도
attack.wbsp53.1.text: 동전을 한 번 던져서 앞면이 나오면 20의 추가 데미지를 주고 뒷면이 나오면 상대 배틀 포켓몬을 잠듦으로 만든다.
set.gymh.name: Gym Heroes
card.gymh1.name: Blaine's Moltres
attack.gymh1.1.name: Phoenix Flame
attack.gymh1.1.text: Flip a coin. If tails, shuffle Blaine's Moltres and all cards attached to it into your deck (after doing damage).
card.gymh10.name: Misty's Tentacruel
attack.gymh10.1.name: Jellyfish Poison
attack.gymh10.1.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Poisoned. If tails, the Defending Pokémon is now Confused.
card.gymh100.name: Erika
card.gymh100.text: You may draw up to 3 cards, then your opponent may draw up to 3 cards.
card.gymh101.name: Lt. Surge
card.gymh101.text: You can play this card only if you have at least 1 Basic Pokémon card in your hand. Put a Basic Pokémon card from your hand into play as your Active Pokémon. Put your old Active Pokémon onto your Bench. (You can't play this card if your Bench is full.)
card.gymh102.name: Misty
card.gymh102.text: Discard 2 of the other cards in your hand in order to play this card. If this turn's attack does damage to the Defending Pokémon (after applying Weakness and Resistance), and if the attacking Pokémon has Misty in its name, the attack does 20 more damage to the Defending Pokémon.
card.gymh103.name: No Removal Gym
card.gymh103.text: This card stays in play when you play it. Discard this card if another Stadium card comes into play. A player must discard 2 cards from his or her hand in order to play an Energy Removal or Super Energy Removal card.
card.gymh104.name: The Rocket's Training Gym
card.gymh104.text: This card stays in play when you play it. Discard this card if another Stadium card comes into play. Each player pays Colorless more to retreat his or her Active Pokémon.
card.gymh105.name: Blaine's Last Resort
card.gymh105.text: You can't play this card if you have any cards in your hand other than Blaine's Last Resort. Show your hand to your opponent, then draw 5 cards.
card.gymh106.name: Brock's Training Method
card.gymh106.text: Search your deck for a Basic Pokémon or Evolution card with Brock in its name. Show that card to your opponent, then put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.
card.gymh107.name: Celadon City Gym
card.gymh107.text: This card stays in play when you play it. Discard this card if another Stadium card comes into play. During each player's turn, that player may choose to discard an Energy card attached to 1 of his or her Pokémon with Erika in its name. If that player does so, that Pokémon is no longer Asleep, Confused, Paralyzed, or Poisoned.
card.gymh108.name: Cerulean City Gym
card.gymh108.text: This card stays in play when you play it. Discard this card if another Stadium card comes into play. Each player pays Colorless less to retreat his or her Pokémon if it has Misty in its name.
card.gymh109.name: Erika's Maids
card.gymh109.text: Trade 2 of the other cards in your hand for up to 2 Basic Pokémon and/or Evolution cards with Erika in their names from your deck. Show those cards to your opponent, then put them into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.
card.gymh11.name: Rocket's Hitmonchan
attack.gymh11.1.name: Crosscounter
attack.gymh11.1.text: If an attack does damage to Rocket's Hitmonchan during your opponent's next turn (even if Rocket's Hitmonchan is Knocked Out), flip a coin. If heads, Rocket's Hitmonchan attacks your opponent's Active Pokémon for double that amount of damage. (If Rocket's Hitmonchan takes 20 damage, it does 40 damage to that Pokémon.)
attack.gymh11.2.name: Magnum Punch
card.gymh110.name: Erika's Perfume
card.gymh110.text: Look at your opponent's hand. If he or she has any Basic Pokémon cards there, you may put any number of them onto your opponent's Bench (as long as there's room).
card.gymh111.name: Good Manners
card.gymh111.text: In order to play this card, you can't have any Basic Pokémon cards in your hand. Show your hand to your opponent, then search your deck for a Basic Pokémon card, show it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.
card.gymh112.name: Lt. Surge's Treaty
card.gymh112.text: Your opponent chooses 1 of the following: everyone chooses 1 of his or her own Prizes and put it into his or her hand, or you draw a card.
card.gymh113.name: Minion of Team Rocket
card.gymh113.text: Flip 2 coins. If both of them are heads, choose 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon and return it and all cards attached to it to his or her hand. If 1 or both of them are tails, your turn ends immediately (you can't attack this turn).
card.gymh114.name: Misty's Wrath
card.gymh114.text: Look at the top 7 cards of your deck. Choose 2 of those cards and put them into your hand. Discard the rest.
card.gymh115.name: Pewter City Gym
card.gymh115.text: This card stays in play when you play it. Discard this card if another Stadium card comes into play. Don't apply Resistance to any attacks made by Pokémon with Brock in their names.
card.gymh116.name: Recall
card.gymh116.text: For your attack this turn, your Active Pokémon can use any attack from its Basic Pokémon card or any Evolution card attached to it. (You still have to pay for that attack's Energy cost.)
card.gymh117.name: Sabrina's ESP
card.gymh117.text: Attach Sabrina's ESP to 1 of your Pokémon with Sabrina in its name. At the end of your turn, discard Sabrina's ESP. If that Pokémon uses and attack that involves flipping coins, Sabrina's ESP lets you re-flip those coins once. If you do, re-flip all the coins.
card.gymh118.name: Secret Mission
card.gymh118.text: Look at your opponent's hand. Then, you may discard as many other cards as you want from your hand and draw that many cards.
card.gymh119.name: Tickling Machine
card.gymh119.text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent sets aside all the cards in his or her hand face down. Nobody may look at those cards. At the end of your opponent's next turn, your opponent puts those cards back into his or her hand. If tails, your turn ends immediately (you can't attack this turn).
card.gymh12.name: Rocket's Moltres
attack.gymh12.1.name: Fire Wall
attack.gymh12.1.text: If an attack does damage to Rocket's Moltres during your opponent's next turn (even if Rocket's Moltres is Knocked Out), Rocket's Moltres attacks your opponent's Active Pokémon for 10 damage. (Apply Weakness and Resistance.)
card.gymh120.name: Vermilion City Gym
card.gymh120.text: This card stays in play when you play it. Discard this card if another Stadium card comes into play. Whenever a player attacks with a Pokémon with Lt. Surge in its name, he or she may flip a coin. If heads, and if that Pokémon's attack does damage to the Defending Pokémon (after applying Weakness and Resistance), that attack does 10 more damage to the Defending Pokémon. If tails, the attacking Pokémon does 10 damage to itself in addition to whatever its attack usually does.
card.gymh121.name: Blaine's Gamble
card.gymh121.text: Discard any number of other cards from your hand, then flip a coin. If heads, draw twice that many cards.
card.gymh122.name: Energy Flow
card.gymh122.text: For each of your Pokémon, you may return any number of Energy cards attached to it to your hand.
card.gymh123.name: Misty's Duel
card.gymh123.text: You and your opponent play a game of Rock-Paper-Scissors. The winner shuffles his or her hand into his or her deck and draws a new hand of 5 cards. (If you don't know how to play Rock-Paper-Scissors, flip a coin to decide who's the winner.)
card.gymh124.name: Narrow Gym
card.gymh124.text: This card stays in play when you play it. Discard this card if another Stadium card comes into play. No player may have more than 4 Pokémon on his or her Bench. When this card is played, if a player has 5 Pokémon on his or her Bench, that player chooses 1 of them and returns it and all cards attached to it to his or her hand. (If both players have to return a Pokémon, your opponent returns a Pokémon first.)
card.gymh125.name: Sabrina's Gaze
card.gymh125.text: Each player shuffles his or her hand into his or her deck and draws a new hand of the same number of cards.
card.gymh126.name: Trash Exchange
card.gymh126.text: Count the number of cards in your discard pile and shuffle them into your deck. Then discard that many cards from the top of your deck.
card.gymh127.name: 격투의 에너지
card.gymh128.name: 불꽃의 에너지
card.gymh129.name: 풀의 에너지
card.gymh13.name: Rocket's Scyther
attack.gymh13.1.name: Shadow Images
attack.gymh13.1.text: Whenever Rocket's Scyther is attacked, your opponent flips a coin. If tails, that attack does no damage to Rocket's Scyther. (Any other effects of the attack still happen.) This effect lasts until Rocket's Scyther takes damage (or is Benched or is evolved).
attack.gymh13.2.name: Blinding Scythe
card.gymh130.name: 번개의 에너지
card.gymh131.name: 초의 에너지
card.gymh132.name: 물의 에너지
card.gymh14.name: Sabrina's Gengar
attack.gymh14.1.name: Pain Amplifier
attack.gymh14.1.text: Put a damage counter on each of your opponent's Pokémon has already has any damage counters on it.
attack.gymh14.2.name: Call of the Night
attack.gymh14.2.text: Unless this attack Knocks Out the Defending Pokémon, flip 2 coins. If both of them are heads, your opponent shuffles his or her Active Pokémon and all cards attached to it into his or her deck.
card.gymh15.name: Brock
card.gymh15.text: Remove 1 damage counter from each of your Pokémon that has any damage counters on it.

card.gymh16.text: You may draw up to 3 cards, then your opponent may draw up to 3 cards.

card.gymh17.text: You can play this card only if you have at least 1 Basic Pokémon card in your hand. Put a Basic Pokémon card from your hand into play as your Active Pokémon. Put your old Active Pokémon onto your Bench. (You can't play this card if your Bench is full.)
card.gymh18.name: Misty
card.gymh18.text: Discard 2 of the other cards in your hand in order to play this card. If this turn's attack does damage to the Defending Pokémon (after applying Weakness and Resistance), and if the attacking Pokémon has Misty in its name, the attack does 20 more damage to the Defending Pokémon.
card.gymh19.name: The Rocket's Trap
card.gymh19.text: Flip a coin. If heads, choose up to 3 cards at random from your opponent's hand (don't look at them). Your opponent shuffles those cards into his or her deck.

attack.gymh2.1.name: Lariat
attack.gymh2.1.text: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

attack.gymh20.1.name: Rock Slide
attack.gymh20.1.text: If your opponent has any Benched Pokémon, choose up to 3 of them. This attack does 10 damgae to each of them. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)
attack.gymh20.2.name: Fissure

attack.gymh22.2.text: Brock's Rhyhorn does 10 damage to itself.

attack.gymh23.2.name: Sandstorm
attack.gymh23.2.text: If the Defending Pokémon tries to attack during your opponent's next turn, your opponent flips a coin. If tails, that attack does nothing.

attack.gymh24.1.name: Alert

attack.gymh24.2.name: Wing Attack

attack.gymh28.1.name: Mega Punch
attack.gymh28.2.name: Thunderbolt

attack.gymh32.1.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Asleep.

card.gymh34.name: Sabrina's Venomoth

card.gymh35.name: Blaine's Growlithe
attack.gymh35.1.name: Shake
attack.gymh35.1.text: If your opponent has any Benched Pokémon, he or she chooses 1 of them and switches it with the Defending Pokémon. (Do the damage before switching the Pokémon.)

attack.gymh35.2.text: Blaine's Growlithe does 10 damage to itself.

attack.gymh37.2.text: Discard the top 5 cards of your deck. (If there are fewer than 5 cards in your deck, discard all of them.) This attack does 20 damage for each Fire Energy card you discarded in this way.
card.gymh38.name: Brock's Geodude
attack.gymh38.1.name: Tackle
attack.gymh38.2.name: Lucky Shot
attack.gymh38.2.text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon and flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 30 damage to that Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.) This attack can't be used if your opponent has no Benched Pokémon.

attack.gymh39.1.name: Dive

attack.gymh4.2.name: Take Away
attack.gymh4.2.text: Shuffle Erika's Dragonair and all cards attached to it into your deck. Then, your opponent shuffles his or her Active Pokémon and all cards attached to it into his or her deck.

card.gymh97.name: Blaine's Quiz #1
card.gymh97.text: Put a Basic Pokémon or Evolution card from your hand face down in front of you and tell your opponent its name. Your opponent guesses the length of that Pokémon. Flip the card over. If your opponent guessed right, he or she draws 2 cards. If your opponent guessed wrong, you draw 2 cards. Either way, return the card to your hand.
card.gymh98.name: Brock
card.gymh98.text: Remove 1 damage counter from each of your Pokémon that has any damage counters on it.
card.gymh99.name: Charity
card.gymh99.text: Attach Charity to your Active Pokémon. Unless that Pokémon gets Knocked Out, return Charity to your hand at the end of your turn. If that Pokémon attacks and does damage to the Defending Pokémon, you may reduce that damage by any amount (rounded to the nearest 10).
set.gymc.name: Gym Challenge
card.gymc1.name: Blaine's Arcanine
attack.gymc1.1.name: Heat Tackle
attack.gymc1.1.text: Blaine's Arcanine does 10 damage to itself.
attack.gymc1.2.name: Firestorm
attack.gymc1.2.text: Discard 3 Fire Energy cards attached to Blaine's Arcanine in order to use this attack.
card.gymc10.name: Koga's Ditto
attack.gymc10.1.name: Giant Growth
attack.gymc10.1.text: Flip a coin. If heads, Koga's Ditto's maximum HP is now 80 and Koga's Ditto's Pound attack's base damage is 30 instead of 10. (Benching Koga's Ditto ends this effect.)
attack.gymc10.2.name: Pound
card.gymc100.name: Blaine
card.gymc100.text: During this turn, instead of attaching your free Energy card, you may instead attach 2 Fire Energy cards to 1 of your Pokémon with Blaine in its name. (Playing additional copies of this card this turn has no effect.)
card.gymc101.name: Brock's Protection
card.gymc101.text: Attach Brock's Protection to 1 of your Pokémon with Brock in its name. Energy cards attached to that Pokémon can't be removed by your opponent's attacks or Trainer cards. (This doesn't stop the rest of the attack or Trainer card from working normally.)
card.gymc102.name: Chaos Gym
card.gymc102.text: This card stays in play after being played. Discard this card if another Stadium card comes into play. Whenever a player plays a Trainer card other than a Stadium card, he or she flips a coin. If heads, that player plays that card normally. If tails, the player can't play that card. If the card isn't put into play, the player's opponent may use that card instead, if he or she does everything required in order to play that card (like discarding cards). Either way, the card goes to its owner's discard pile.
card.gymc103.name: Erika's Kindness
card.gymc103.text: Remove 2 damage counters from each Pokémon (yours and your opponent's) with any damage counters on it. If a Pokémon has just 1 damage counter, remove it.
card.gymc104.name: Giovanni
card.gymc104.text: Choose 1 of your Pokémon in play with Giovanni in its name. For the rest of your turn, you may evolve that Pokémon even if you just played or evolved it this turn or if this is your first turn. This effect also applies to the Pokémon it evolves into.
card.gymc105.name: Giovanni's Last Resort
card.gymc105.text: Remove all damage counters from 1 of your Pokémon with Giovanni in its name. Then discard your hand.
card.gymc106.name: Koga
card.gymc106.text: If an attack from a Pokémon with Koga in its name does damage to a Defending Pokémon this turn, that Pokémon is then Poisoned.
card.gymc107.name: Lt. Surge's Secret Plan
card.gymc107.text: Put 1 card from your hand face down onto your Bench. (You can't play this card if your Bench is full.) Treat that card as a Basic Pokémon as long as it's face down. Flip the card if either player needs to know what it is in order to use an attack, a Pokémon Power, or a Trainer card. Flip the card if it ever uses an attack or Pokémon Power, evolves, retreats, is damaged by an attack, or is otherwise affected by an attack. At any time during your turn, you may flip the card over. When you flip that card over, if it isn't a Basic Pokémon, discard it and all cards attached to it.
card.gymc108.name: Misty's Wish
card.gymc108.text: Look at 1 of your Prize cards. Then, ask your opponent if you may switch that card with 1 of the cards in your hand. If your opponent accepts and if you have any other cards in your hand, switch those cards. If your opponent declines, return the Prize card face down and draw a card.
card.gymc109.name: Resistance Gym
card.gymc109.text: This card stays in play after being played. Discard this card if another Stadium card comes into play. Each Pokémon's Resistance is reduced by 20. (If a Pokémon's Resistance is -30, it becomes -10.)
card.gymc11.name: Lt. Surge's Raichu
attack.gymc11.1.name: Kerzap
attack.gymc11.1.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 damage plus 30 more damage to the Defending Pokémon and discard all Lightning Energy cards attached to Lt. Surge's Raichu. If tails, this attack does 20 damage.
attack.gymc11.2.name: Thundertackle
attack.gymc11.2.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed. If tails, Lt. Surge's Raichu does 20 damage to itself.
card.gymc110.name: Sabrina
card.gymc110.text: Take all Energy cards attached to 1 of your Pokémon with Sabrina in its name and attach them to another 1 of your Pokémon with Sabrina in its name.
card.gymc111.name: Blaine's Quiz #2
card.gymc111.text: Put a card from your hand face down in front of you. Your opponent guesses whether it is an Energy card, a Trainer card, or a Pokémon (Basic or Evolution) card. Flip the card over. If your opponent guessed right, he or she draws 2 cards. If your opponent guessed wrong, you draw 2 cards. Either way, return the card to your hand.
card.gymc112.name: Blaine's Quiz #3
card.gymc112.text: Put a Basic or Evolution card from your hand face down in front of you and tell your opponent the name of an attack of that card. Your opponent guesses the name of that card. Flip the card over. If your opponent guessed right, he or she draws 3 cards. If your opponent guessed wrong, you draw 3 cards. Either way, return the card to your hand.
card.gymc113.name: Cinnabar City Gym
card.gymc113.text: This card stays in play after being played. Discard this card if another Stadium card comes into play. Ignore Weakness when a Water Pokémon does damage to a Pokémon with Blaine in its name.
card.gymc114.name: Fuchsia City Gym
card.gymc114.text: This card stays in play after being played. Discard this card if another Stadium card comes into play. Once during each player's turn (before attacking), that player may flip a coin. If heads, that player may shuffle 1 of his or her Pokémon in play with Koga in its name and any cards attached to it into his or her deck.
card.gymc115.name: Koga's Ninja Trick
card.gymc115.text: Attach Koga's Ninja Trick to your Active Pokémon with Koga in its name. If this Pokémon goes to your Bench, discard this card. When your opponent attacks, you may switch this Pokémon with 1 of your Benched Pokémon (before damage or other effects of attacks).
card.gymc116.name: Master Ball
card.gymc116.text: Look at 7 cards from the top of your deck. You may choose a Basic Pokémon or Evolution card from those cards, show it to your opponent, then put it into your hand. Shuffle the rest into your deck.
card.gymc117.name: Max Revive
card.gymc117.text: Discard 2 Energy cards from your hand in order to put 1 Basic Pokémon from your discard pile onto your Bench. (You can't play Max Revive if your Bench is full.)
card.gymc118.name: Misty's Tears
card.gymc118.text: Discard 1 of the other cards in your hand in order to search your deck for up to 2 Water Energy cards. Show those cards to your opponent, then put them into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.
card.gymc119.name: Rocket's Minefield Gym
card.gymc119.text: This card stays in play after being played. Discard this card if another Stadium card comes into play. Whenever a player puts a Basic Pokémon onto his or her Bench from his or her hand, he or she flips a coin. If tails, put damage counters on that Pokémon.
card.gymc12.name: Misty's Golduck
attack.gymc12.1.name: Electro Beam
attack.gymc12.1.text: Flip a coin. If tails, discard all Energy cards attached to Misty's Golduck.
attack.gymc12.2.name: Super Removal
attack.gymc12.2.text: Flip a coin. If heads, choose 1 Energy card attached to each of your opponent's Pokémon that has any Energy cards and discard those Energy cards.
card.gymc120.name: Rocket's Secret Experiment
card.gymc120.text: Flip a coin. If heads, search your deck for any card and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward. If tails, you can't play Trainer cards until the end of your next turn.
card.gymc121.name: Sabrina's Psychic Control
card.gymc121.text: Flip a coin. If heads, choose a Trainer card in your opponent's discard pile that isn't put in play (like PlusPower or Mysterious Fossil). You may use that card as if it were in your hand, if you do everything required in order to play that card (like discarding cards). The card stays in your opponent's discard pile.
card.gymc122.name: Saffron City Gym
card.gymc122.text: This card stays in play after being played. Discard this card if another Stadium card comes into play. As often as each player like during his or her turn (before attacking), that player may return 1 basic Energy card attached to 1 of his or her Pokémon with Sabrina in its name to his or her hand.
card.gymc123.name: Viridian City Gym
card.gymc123.text: This card stays in play after being played. Discard this card if another Stadium card comes into play. Whenever a Pokémon with Giovanni in its name evolves, its owner removes 2 damage counters from that Pokémon (or 1 if it only has 1).
card.gymc124.name: Fervor
card.gymc124.text: Show the top 3 cards of your deck to all players. Put any Fire Energy cards there into your hand and discard the rest.
card.gymc125.name: Transparent Walls
card.gymc125.text: Until the end of your opponent's next turn, prevent all damage from attacks done to your Benched Pokémon. (Any other effects of attacks still happen.)
card.gymc126.name: Warp Point
card.gymc126.text: If your opponent has any Benched Pokémon, he or she chooses 1 of them and switches it with his or her Active Pokémon, then, if you have any Benched Pokémon, you switch 1 of them with your Active Pokémon.

card.gymc25.name: Koga's Arbok
